column5: Waterfront views! This bright and spacious 2 bedroom/2 bathroom condo sleeps 6 guests and includes nice amenities such as towels, linens, cookware, washer, dryer, TV's, DVD player, VHS and more! The unit has 2 Queens and 1 sleeper. Enjoy the two private balconies or take a stroll along the banks of the Comal River that also include private river access.
column8: These condos are your ideal New Braunfels vacation rental. - Camp Warnecke - C216
